TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Grid extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class Grid Inherits Panel Implements IAddChild
public ref class Grid : System::Windows::Controls::Panel, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type Grid = class inherit Panel interface IAddChild

summary.span: 定义由列和行组成的灵活的网格区域。

span.span: Defines a flexible grid area that consists of columns and rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个包含一系列对象，后者是在属性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 中定义的行和列可以充分利用调整大小以按比例分配剩余空间。Columns and rows that are defined within a can take advantage of sizing to distribute remaining space proportionally. 当被选为的高度或宽度的行或列，该列或行将收到剩余的可用空间的加权的比例。When is selected as the height or width of a row or column, that column or row receives a weighted proportion of the remaining available space. 这是与，这样可以将分发空间均匀地根据行或列中的内容的大小。This is in contrast to , which distributes space evenly based on the size of the content that is within a column or row. 此值表示为`*`或`2*`当你使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This value is expressed as `*` or `2*` when you use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 在第一种情况下，行或列将得到一倍的可用空间，在第二种情况下，行或列将得到两倍的可用空间，依次类推。In the first case, the row or column would receive one times the available space, while in the second case, the row or column would receive two times the available space, and so on. 通过将此技术来按比例分配空间的组合和的值`Stretch`，可以将布局空间分区的屏幕空间的百分比。By combining this technique to proportionally distribute space with a and value of `Stretch`, it is possible to partition layout space by percentage of screen space. 是唯一的布局面板，可以将分发在这种方式中的空间。 is the only layout panel that can distribute space in this manner. 默认情况下，行和列占用的空间量最少需要适应任何给定的行或列中包含的单元格内的最大内容。By default, rows and columns take up the least amount of space necessary to accommodate the largest content within any cell contained in a given row or column. 例如，如果某一列具有与的长的单词的一个单元格等"hippopotamus"中它，但所有其他单元格的列中包含"dog"等的较小单词，列的宽度将最大的单词 (hippopotamus) 的宽度。For example, if a column has one cell with a long word like "hippopotamus" contained within it but all the other cells in the column have smaller words like "dog", the width of the column will be the width of the largest word (hippopotamus). 您可以精确定位子元素使用的组合属性和对齐方式属性。You can precisely position child elements of a by using a combination of the property and alignment properties. 子元素的绘制标记或代码中出现的顺序。Child elements of a are drawn in the order in which they appear in markup or code. 因此，当元素共享相同的坐标时，可实现分层的顺序 （也称为 z-顺序）。As a consequence, layered order (also known as z-order) can be achieved when elements share the same coordinates. 和共享某些通用功能，但每个可以应用于相应方案以便更好地利用其内置功能。 and share some common functionality, but each can be applied in appropriate scenarios to better use its built-in features. 根据行和列的索引; 添加元素却没有。 adds elements based on a row and column index; does not. 元素可分层内容，其中多个元素可以存在的单个单元格中。The element allows layering of content, where more than one element can exist within a single cell. 不支持分层。 does not support layering. 子元素的相对于其"单元格"边界左上角进行绝对定位。Child elements of a can be absolutely positioned relative to the upper-left corner of their "cell" boundaries. 不支持此功能。 does not support this feature. 也提供了更灵活地调整大小行为比。 also offers more flexible resizing behavior than . 使用对象定义的大小调整特性或。 uses the object to define the sizing characteristics of a or . 有关每个单元类型的定义，请参阅。For a definition of each unit type, see . 如果子元素添加到中的列，并且列没有其属性设置为`Auto`，子级都不受限制地将测量。If a child element is added to a column within a , and the column has its property set to `Auto`, the child will be measured without restrictions. 此行为可防止水平滚动条显示如果正在使用中，测量子元素为 unbounded。This behavior can prevent horizontal scroll bars from displaying if a is being used, as the child element is measured as unbounded. 出于显示目的，子剪辑而滚动。For purposes of display, the child is clipped rather than scrolled. Panel 元素默认情况下不接收焦点。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要强制面板元素接收焦点，设置属性设置为`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建网格。The following example demonstrates how to create a grid. 在这种情况下，网格定义三个元素和四个托管子内容的元素。In this case, the grid defines three elements and four elements that host child content. [!code-csharp[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/CSharp/Grid_Code.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/VisualBasic/grid_vb.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/XAML/default.xaml#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示多个 元素共享大小信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that multiple elements are sharing size information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共享大小的行和列不遵从大小调整。Columns and rows participating in size sharing do not respect sizing. 在此方案中，调整大小将被视为。In this scenario, sizing is treated as . 如果网格大小共享无法工作设置为`true`内的资源模板，和一个该模板的外部定义。Grid size sharing does not work if is set to `true` within a resource template, and a is defined outside of that template. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和代码。The following code examples demonstrate how to use the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xml[gridIssharedsizescopeProp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/gridIssharedsizescopeProp/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] ...... [!code-xml[gridIssharedsizescopeProp#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/gridIssharedsizescopeProp/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] ...... 在定义的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过使用代码进行处理。Events defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] are handled using code. [!code-csharp[gridIssharedsizescopeProp#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/gridIssharedsizescopeProp/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[gridIssharedsizescopeProp#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/gridIssharedsizescopeProp/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用网格线创建中的所有元素周围的点线。Enabling grid lines creates dotted lines around all the elements within a . 可用仅点线，因为此属性用作设计工具来调试布局问题，但不可在生产质量代码中使用。Only dotted lines are available because this property is intended as a design tool to debug layout problems and is not intended for use in production quality code. 如果想要在行中的元素设置样式为具有边框。If you want lines inside a , style the elements within the to have borders. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可视化树必须不修改此方法的调用过程中。The visual tree must not be modified during a call to this method.
